keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support initiatives to create more jobs and facilitate apprenticeships in Oxford.
Work with local authorities to ensure there are improvements in the standard of education delivered by schools in Oxford.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Reducing crime and the fear of crime
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Work with the police to reduce crime and the fear of crime in Oxford East.

issues.education: Work with local authorities to ensure there are improvements in the standard of education delivered by schools in Oxford.
